fields.name: Replacement Weapon:

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK%  |<goblet>  Cryo DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Normal Attack: Rapid Fire
**2)** Elemental Burst: Prophecies of Dawn
**3)** Elemental Skill: Frozen Wilds

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: On-Field DPS build is based around gaining Coil Stacks and using her Normal Attack string on a frozen enemy. When played with Cryo resonance and Blizzard Strayer, CRIT Rate can be quite low.
